title: Fix context-audit monorepo detection
description: The context-audit skill fails to detect React Native and UI components in monorepos (packages/*/package.json pattern). Fix detection to handle monorepo structures.

acceptanceCriteria.text: Update audit.sh to check packages/*/package.json for react-native/expo

Update audit.sh to check apps/*/package.json for monorepo apps
Test on domica: correctly detects React Native, Supabase, RTL, UI components
